body_html:
We currently only support some flags down from setup.py into CMake but we're looking to expose more. This will be selective, though.

You can modify https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh#L288 locally to pass whatever flags you need.

If you require something that isn't currently supported from setup.py please let us know and thanks.
body_text:
We currently only support some flags down from setup.py into CMake but we're looking to expose more. This will be selective, though.
You can modify https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh#L288 locally to pass whatever flags you need.
If you require something that isn't currently supported from setup.py please let us know and thanks.
body:
We currently only support some flags down from setup.py into CMake but we're looking to expose more. This will be selective, though.

You can modify https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh#L288 locally to pass whatever flags you need.

If you require something that isn't currently supported from setup.py please let us know and thanks.
